doc:
Nigel Terry https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nigel_Terry 0 Nigel Terry (15 August 1945 – 30 April 2015) was a British stage and film actor probably best known by film audiences for his portrayal of King Arthur in John Boorman's Excalibur (1981). Terry primarily dedicated himself to the classical stage. When he extended himself into film and TV outings, it was mostly for historical or period roles. Nigel_Terry ( 15_August_1945 – 30_April_2015 ) was a_British_stage_and_film_actor probably best_known by film_audiences for his_portrayal of King_Arthur in John_Boorman 's_Excalibur ( 1981 ) . Terry primarily dedicated himself to the_classical_stage . When he extended himself into film_and_TV_outings , it was mostly for historical_or_period_roles .
